comment: EXISTS subquery when the default ks is different than the inner query
query: select exists(select * from user where id = 5)

plan.Original: select exists(select * from user where id = 5)

Instructions.FieldQuery: select exists (select 1 from `user` where 1 != 1) from dual where 1 != 1
Instructions.Query: select exists (select 1 from `user` where id = 5) from dual
